tagline: For smooth, young looking hands.
main_description: Pigmentary blemishes represent one of the major natural phenomena of skin ageing. Hormonal changes, too frequent exposure to the sun or exposure without protection are the source of increased disturbance of the skinâ€™s natural pigmentation. So, with the passing of time, pigmentary blemishes, more commonly called brown spots, appear on the skin.

A complex of 7 certified organic Swiss Alpine plants (Mallow flower, mint, alchemilla, primrose, veronica, melissa and achillea) helps regulate the natural pigmentation and unify the skin. Combined with an ultra-performing derivative of highly concentrated Vitamin C, it provides antioxidant and protecting benefits. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.

tagline: Moisturizing, protecting, unifying, correcting and illuminating tinted cream.

Enriched with demo-soothing Swiss Mallow flower extract and vitamin E, which protects against free radical scavengers. Also contains a Â«soft focusÂ» agent and innovative colour pigments to visually fade out lines, wrinkles and tired features. Free from mineral oil, phthalates and sodium laureth sulfate.
how_to_use: Apply MAVALA TINTED CREAM to your face and neck with your fingertips, with or without a specific care underneath. Smooth in evenly. Can also be used as a radiant touch, to illuminate areas where tiredness appears.

title: TOTAL BI-PHASE MAKEUP REMOVER
tagline: Oil-in-water formula to get rid of all types of make-up.
main_description: It is essential to be able to effectively remove make-up from the eyes, without rubbing or irritating the delicate eye contour zone thus without accelerating the ageing of this fragile area.
key_ingredients: Blend of mild oils for total and rapid effectiveness on all types of make-up, even water resistant. Alpine water, naturally pure and perfectly balanced in trace elements. The correct dosage of water in this make-up remover avoids any oily deposit and reinforces the immediate sensation of freshness and lightness of this cleanser. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, fragrance and paraben.
how_to_use: Shake the bottle before use to mix the 2 phases. Apply a cotton pad dampened with TOTAL BI-PHASE and hold it for a moment on the eye, pat gently to "dissolve" the make-up. Remove make-up in a long up and down motion (from the brow bone to the lower eyelid), then repeat upwards and finally from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye. If the make-up is particularly stubborn, it is recommended to repeat the operation, without rubbing, to avoid stretching the skin around the eyes.

title: BLUE NAIL POLISH REMOVER
tagline: Acetone based remover
main_description: Its classical and efficient formula quickly removes polish. For all nails except fragile and delicate nails. Available in a plastic bottle.
key_ingredients: Acetone (82%) and Castor oil to counteract the oil-removing, drying effect of acetone.
how_to_use: Moisten a cotton pad with BLUE NAIL POLISH REMOVER and apply to the nail surface. Hold in place for several seconds to enable the remover to penetrate the layers of polish. Wipe off in one stroke. Wash hands. Find more tips and view our manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY.
note: A second application may be necessary, if there are several coats or if the polish is dark.
safety_directions: Do not swallow. Avoid contact with eyes. Avoid contact with skin. Avoid breathing vapour.
first_aid: For advice, contact a Poison Control Centre (1-844-POISON-X / 1-844-764-7669 in Canada) or a doctor at once. If swallowed, do NOT induce vomiting.

title: CHRONOBIOLOGICAL DAY CREAM
tagline: Youth and protection for a fresh and radiant skin.
main_description: Your skin follows a very precise biorhythm: it defends itself during the day, and renews itself at night. Lack of sun exposure or sleep, stress, pollution or smoking can disrupt the proper functioning of the skin biorhythm. Skin becomes less resistant, dehydrated and wrinkles set in.
key_ingredients: This advanced exceptional skincare combines chronopeptides able to mimic the benefits of daylight on the skin in order to preserve its own protective potential, thousands of Alpine Rose stem cells, whose resistance to extreme climate give them unique anti-ageing properties, pro-youth silicium and powerful antioxidants. Formulated with pure Alpine water and enriched with demo-soothing Swiss Mallow flower extract. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate and paraben.
how_to_use: Apply 1 or 2 pumps of product every morning on clean face or after ANTI AGE PRO Day Serum, for a perfect synergy of anti-ageing ingredients. May also be used as an eye contour mask. Apply in a thicker layer and leave on for 10 minutes to smooth out the skin and give your eyes a bright look. Then remove the excess with CLEAN & COMFORT Toning Lotion.
note: Its 45ml tube with pump with airless closing preserves the formula, before, during and after application. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested.

safety_directions: Warning: Corrosive. Attacks skin and eyes. May produce severe burns. Do not swallow. Wear eye protection and protective gloves when mixing or using.
first_aid: For advice, contact a Poison Control Centre (1-844-POISON-X / 1-844-764-7669 in Canada) or a doctor at once. If swallowed, do NOT induce vomiting. If in eyes, hold eyelids apart and flush the eye continuously with running water. Continue flushing until advised to stop by a Poison Control Centre or a doctor, or for at least 15 minutes. If skin or hair contact occurs, remove contaminated clothing and flush skin and hair with running water.

title: PERFECTING FOAMING CLEANSER
tagline: Removes make-up, toxins and impurities without drying the skin.
main_description: External aggressions and hormonal changes can disrupt natural sebum production, causing imperfections, shine and dilated pores. The skin surface is uneven and sometimes oily, in particularly on the T-zone (forehead, nose, chin).

Concentrated in Fleischer Willowherb, a rare persistent Alpine species rich in flavonoids (anti-inflammatory and antioxidant), the Perfecting Foaming Cleanser inhibits the activity of the 5-alpha-reductase, enzyme responsible for sebum production. Diminishing the activity of this enzyme in this way is the most effective method to visibly reduce sebum production, without drying out skin. It also contains Witch Hazel water, a shrub used for centuries for its disinfectant and anti-inflammatory properties. Its richness in tannins and flavonoids provides astringent, toning and purifying properties. how_to_use: Apply one pump of product on damp face. Massage to remove impurities and make-up. Rinse off with cold water to maximize astringent effect. Does not sting the eyes, can be used to remove traces of eye make-up remover. Can be used in the shower.

title: FRENCH MANICURE KIT
tagline: The easy solution for an impeccable French manicure.
main_description: These clever kits include a white shade to cover the free edge of your nail and a nude shade to be applied on the entire nail surface. But the secret to the easy French manicure lies in 2 other items included in the kit:
how_to_use: Apply a protective base coat on the entire nail plate and wait for a few seconds. (base coat not included in kit)Position a Manicure Sticker Guide on each nail to set the limits of the free edge you wish to highlight. (Note: additional Sticker Guides may be purchased as required)Proceed with a thin coat of the white nail colour on the free edge only.Remove the Manicure Sticker guides and let the white nail polish dry.Apply a coat of the other nail polish colour over the entire nail surface (including the tip covered with white nail polish). Proceed with a second coat if you prefer a stronger look.A final coat of Minute Quick-Finish will dry your French manicure in seconds and provide an incomparable shine to your nails. Find more tips and view our manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY.

title: FRENCH MANICURE STICKER GUIDES

how_to_use: Apply a protective base coat (for instance MAVALA 002) on the entire nail plate and allow to dry. Place on each nail, a STICKER GUIDE following the free edge of the nail, to define the surface that will be highlighted. Apply, on the free edge of the nail, a coat of white nail polish (or of the chosen colour to highlight the free edge). Remove the STICKER GUIDES immediately. Follow with one or two thin coats of a pastel nail polish or incolore (or any colour chosen) to apply on the entire nail surface. End with a MAVALA top coat. Find more tips and view our full French manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY.

key_ingredients: Mineral oil, an effective makeup remover (including waterproof makeup). Free from phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, alcohol and fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply the felt-tip on the mistake to be removed. In one stroke, it is removed, as if by magic. After use, dab your skin with a paper tissue and re-apply a touch of MAVALA Dream Foundation, Tinted Cream, Powder, or Eyelid Powder, depending on where the mistake was made. Then, clean the stained tip with a paper tissue. When the tip can no longer be wiped clean, replace it with one of the three spare tips provided.
note: Ophthalmologically tested.

title: MANICURE BOWL
tagline: Ergonomic and resistant.
main_description: This manicure bowl is easy to open and clean. Its shape comfortably accommodates the fingers and prevents spilling. Nail polish remover resistant.
how_to_use: Fill a little with lukewarm water. Add an effervescent MANICURE PILL. Soak fingertips for a few minutes. Cuticles will be then softened and easy to remove with the MANICURE STICK. Find more tips to care for your cuticles at MAVACADEMY

title: MANICURE PILL
tagline: Eases manicure.
main_description: Turns ordinary tap water into an effervescent softening solution. Cuticles become smooth and can be easily rolled back using MAVALA CUTICLE REMOVER and a manicure stick wrapped in cotton wool. An important initial step used by professional manicurists.

title: MANICURE STICKS
tagline: Made of birch wood.
main_description: Wrap the bevelled end of the stick with cotton wool to roll back cuticles and remove dead skin. The other side (arrow shaped) is handy to remove nail polish smudges or clean under the free edge of nails.
how_to_use: After application of CUTICLE REMOVER, wrap the end of the stick with cotton wool and gently roll back cuticles. Find more tips and view our manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY
note: Always wrap the end of the stick with cotton, to avoid damaging the cuticles and the root of the nail.

title: MAVA-CLEAR
tagline: Anti-Drying Lemon Scented Hand Sanitiser.
main_description: Purifying gel for hands, and also for surfaces. Fights bad odours. Eliminates 99.9% of bacteria (in vitro proven bactericide and fungicide efficacy).
key_ingredients: Over 64% alcohol content to kill bacteria. Rich in anti-drying essential lemon oil. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Squeeze a small amount onto your palm and quickly rub hands together until dry. Do not rinse off. To clean a surface, use with a paper tissue.

title: MAVA-FLEX
tagline: Moisturising serum for nails.
main_description: Nails that are very dry, too hard and brittle are often due to external drying factors (harsh chemicals, working with frequent contact with water, overexposure to sun), but also to internal factors (age, diet, heredity).
key_ingredients: Contains urea and saccharides to target the optimum moisture balance for a better flexibility of nails, calcium to fortify nails, lemon essential oil and vitamin B5 to help reinforce the nail structure. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Brush onto the entire nail surface, after having removed any trace of nail polish, grease or oil. Massage in with your thumb, leave to penetrate. If you continue with your manicure, make sure you remove first the excess of product with a paper tissue. To be used twice a week on bare nails, ideally before going to bed to allow this serum to act during the night.

title: MAVA+ HAND CREAM
tagline: Extreme hand care for very dry, very stressed hands.
main_description: For active hands, busy with gardening, manual or artistic tasks, outside sports and other activities. MAVA-PLUS Hand Cream protects and relieves reddened, irritated, dry hands or damaged by external factors (cold, sun, harsh climatic changes, wind, use of solvents and detergents).
key_ingredients: Botanical complex with Patersonâ€™s curse, sunflower seed oil and balloon vine, which forms a protective and film-forming shield. Shea butter which repairs, nourishes and smoothes hands. Bisabolol and vitamin E to reduce redness and soothe damaged epidermis. Free from phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate and fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of cream on the back of your hand and generously massage concentrating on very dry, very irritated areas. Apply as often as you wish.

title: MAVA-STRONG
tagline: Fortifying and protective base coat.
main_description: MAVA-STRONG Fortifying Base allows splitting, soft, thus breaking nails to regain their normal, healthy and strong aspect. It combines two actions working in synergy: fortifying and protecting.
key_ingredients: A complex of micro encapsulated active ingredients: tea tree essential oil, vitamin E, hydrolysed soy and wheat proteins and arginine (amino acid). Improves quality of nail surface, by reducing micro-flaking and dehydration. Crystal resin tears produced by the pistachio mastic tree (native from the island of Chios, in Greece). Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply over the whole surface of the clean nail plate before applying nail polish.

title: MAVA-WHITE
tagline: Optical nail whitener.
main_description: Various external factors (colour pigments, nicotine, â€¦) can stain, yellow or make your nails look dull. Their aspect is then particularly unsightly.
key_ingredients: Optical azurant. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: There are three ways to use MAVA-WHITE. 1) for a matt effect, apply MAVA-WHITE on its own on bare nails. 2) for a longer hold and shiny effect, apply a base coat before MAVA-WHITE and a top coat after. 3) for a luminous nail polish shade which is not distorted by yellow nails, put MAVA-WHITE on after a base coat and before nail polish and top coat.

title: MAVADERMA
tagline: Nourishing massage oil for nails.
main_description: It is blood that nourishes the nail roots. If you suffer from bad circulation, nails can grow very slowly.
key_ingredients: Contains vitamin E rich wheat germ oil, which is nourishing and strengthening, olive oil, which improves the nail structure and sweet almond oil, which is emollient, regenerating and remineralising. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate and paraben.
how_to_use: Apply MAVADERMA to the skin below the crescent of the nail and massage with thumb gently to accelerate the penetration. Leave on until it is completely absorbed.

title: MAVADRY
tagline: Fast drying nail polish finish. Enhances colour.
main_description: MAVADRY dries nail polish in a few seconds and prevents flaking. It enhances nail colour and gives a brilliant sheen. Manicure time-saver.
key_ingredients: Blend of resins, solvents and plastifiers. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: After the final coat of nail polish, wait one minute then brush a thin coat of MAVADRY over the entire nail surface. It dries polish in a few seconds and gives a brilliant sheen. It can also be applied after a few days to brighten up your manicure.

title: MAVADRY SPRAY
tagline: Dries nail polish.

title: MAVALA 002 PROTECTIVE BASE COAT
tagline: Double action base coat which protects the nail and extends your manicure.
main_description: MAVALA 002 formula prevents pigments in nail polish from coming in direct contact with the nail plate, protecting it from yellowing. Its slightly "sticky" formula allows perfect adhesion of your nail polish and extends the life of your manicure.

Nitrocellulose, a natural resin extracted from wood which remains porous, letting moisture escape and ensuring that the nail remains strong. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply over the whole surface of the clean nail plate before applying your nail polish.

title: MAVALA LIPSTICK
tagline: Moisturising, comfortable satin lipstick.

key_ingredients: MAVALA LIPSTICK contains a complex of botanical extracts, including candelilla wax for shine, gliding and protective film-forming effect, shea butter and aloe vera for their moisturizing, soothing, regenerating and protecting properties, and the antioxidant and free radical scavenger vitamin E. Contains UVB sun filters. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate and paraben.

For an even longer wear, apply a lip base beforehand. Then apply a first layer of lipstick, pinch a fine handkerchief with your lips and apply again. View our Lips make-up application techniques at MAVACADEMY. Find a harmonious nail polish match with COLOR MATCH.

title: MAVALA SCIENTIFIQUE
tagline: Penetrating nail hardener
main_description: The tip of the nail is the most fragile, most unprotected part of the nail and breaks easily. This is therefore the part of the nail that needs to be strengthened. By quickly hardening the nail, MAVALA SCIENTIFIQUE allows soft, flaking or splitting nails to become healthy and strong. Its formula hardens the nail plate and restores the nail normal growth. Instantly penetrates. Is neither a base nor a nail polish.
key_ingredients: Formaldehyde (2.2%), hardener of the nail keratin, and Mavalaâ€™s exclusive complex, regenerating, anti-drying and strengthener of nails. Free from phthalates and paraben.
how_to_use: Remove your nail polish or any oily film and clean nails thoroughly. Brush on to the free edge of the nails. Leave on for one minute to set. Apply twice a week at the most until your nails have become heatlhy and strong, then two to three times per month if necessary.
safety_directions: Warning: contains formaldehyde. If you would prefer a formaldehyde-free alternative, try our new MAVALA SCIENTIFIQUE K+ Do not swallow. Avoid contact with eyes. Avoid contact with skin. Avoid breathing vapour. Protect cuticles with grease or oil.
first_aid: For advice, contact a Poison Control Centre (1-844-POISON-X / 1-844-764-7669 in Canada) or a doctor at once. If swallowed, do NOT induce vomiting. If in eyes, hold eyelids apart and flush the eye continuously with running water. Continue flushing until advised to stop by a Poison Control Centre or a doctor, or for at least 15 minutes. If inhaled, remove from contaminated area. Apply artificial respiration if not breathing. If skin or hair contact occurs, remove contaminated clothing and flush skin and hair with running water.

title: MAVALA SCIENTIFIQUE K+
tagline: Penetrating nail hardener without formaldehyde.
main_description: The tip of the nail is the most fragile, most unprotected part of the nail and breaks easily. This is therefore the part of the nail that needs to be strengthened. By quickly hardening the nail, MAVALA SCIENTIFIQUE K+ allows soft, flaking or splitting nails to become healthy and strong.
key_ingredients: ðŸŒ± Formulated with 90% of natural origin ingredients. Contains Dimethylurea, a hardener of the nail keratin, and Crystal resin tears, from the pistachio mastic tree, native from the island of Chios in Greece. This gum extract supports the natural keratinization process of nails, reinforcing them. The nail plate will become richer in keratin, therefore more resistant. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Remove your nail polish or any oily film and clean nails thoroughly. Brush on MAVALA SCIENTIFIQUE K+ from the centre of the nail to the tip only. Avoid touching cuticles and skin around nails, to avoid them getting too hard. Leave to penetrate for one minute, by holding hands downwards. Once dry, you can apply your manicure. Use two to three times a week until nails have obtained the desired hardness. You may then space out applications.

title: MAVALA STOP
tagline: Discourages nail biting and thumb sucking.
main_description: MAVALA STOP has a bitter yet harmless taste and the appearance of clear enamel. Helps break the nail biting habit and thumb sucking. Works for children (more than 3 years old) and adults. To use without or over your nail polish. Also recommended for children but not under the age of 3, as their taste buds are not fully developed and they might get used to the bitter taste.
key_ingredients: Ingredient which releases an unpleasant bitter taste when in contact with saliva. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply a coat over the entire nail (or polish) and allow to dry. Repeat the application every two days. Continue the treatment until nail biting is ended. Of course, before each re-application, remove the previous coat of Mavala Stop with a Nail Polish Remover. Follow our detailed stop nail biting treatment plan to stop biting your nails in 33 days!

title: MAVALA STOP PEN
tagline: The applicator pen for bitten nails and cuticles.
main_description: Nail biting is a nervous habit, which can rapidly become uncontrollable and quickly worsen the appearance of nails and their contour.
key_ingredients: ðŸŒ± Formulated with 72% of natural origin ingredients. Contains Denatonium Benzoate, a bitter ingredient, which releases an unpleasant taste when in contact with saliva, and Bulbine frutescens extract (Mannan), a plant native of South Africa that nourishes and soothes the skin around the nails. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply the product using the felt-tip on nail tips, varnished or not, and their contour, then leave to dry. Repeat 2 to 3 times a day if necessary, until the habit of putting fingers in your mouth or nail and cuticle biting has stopped. Avoid washing hands immediately after application. Avoid touching food with fingers, so that the bitter taste does not transmit to food (use cutlery or wear gloves).

It produces an optical smoothing effect that completely hides dark circles, traces of tiredness, fine lines and unifies the eye contour. With foam applicator that enables easy retouching throughout the day.

Natural prebiotics to strengthen the skin barrier and the balance of its microbiota. Contains Boron Nitride, a thin powder that subtly reflects light and creates an optical smoothing effect (soft-focus), and pigments of natural origin. Also contains soothing Swiss Mallow flower extract, ideal for the delicate skin around the eye contour. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben, D5/D6, phenoxyethanol, alcohol, glitter, pearl and fragrance.

Apply a small quantity and spread with fingertips to blend with complexion or onto the product applied beforehand. For a perfect and long-lasting finish, brush on a touch of MAVALA Magic Powder once the make-up is applied. May also be used alone, without forgetting the final powder touch.
note: Colours on your screen may differ significantly from the actual colour of this product. For hygiene reasons, we cannot accept returns on this product. If you have not purchased this product before, we recommend that you visit one of our stockists to purchase it.

key_ingredients: Sunflower oil, sweet almond oil, olive oil and wheat germ oil to soften and nourish cuticles. Repairing and strengthening vitamin A, anti-oxidant vitamin E and reinforcing and protecting vitamin F. Free from formaldehyde, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate and paraben.

If necessary, delicately push back cuticles with the felt tip. Carefully remove any oily film from your nails before continuing with your manicure.

Those imperfections caused by exhaustion give the impression that your skin is in poor health, that it looks, older than it really is.

Concentrated in Swiss Apricot extract, rich in toning and antioxidant provitamin A and in organic acids providing gentle exfoliating properties, it gives an immediate radiant glow to your complexion. Cornflower water, obtained by steam distillation, makes this Micro-Mist an excellent decongestant. Formulated with pure Alpine water and enriched with demo-soothing Swiss Mallow flower extract. Free from mineral oil, phthalates and sodium laureth sulfate. Gas free spray.

In case of extreme tiredness or during mask application, generously soak two cotton pads with the Micro-Mist. Place one on each closed eye and leave on for 2 minutes for a fresher, rested look. For an even more spectacular effect, you may keep the product in the refrigerator for 10 minutes before use.
note: Sets make-up. Spray-pump bottle with ultra-fine spraying. Dermatologically tested.

tagline: Liberates skin from dead cells and reveals its radiance.

Rinse off with water. Gently dry your face. Can be used prior to a mask or night care regimen, in order to improve the penetration of that mask or cream into the skin. Do not apply on irritated or damaged skin.

title: THE ESSENTIALS MULTI-MOISTURIZING KIT
tagline: The complete skin routine for dehydrated skin.

title: MULTI-MOISTURIZING INTENSIVE SERUM
tagline: Intensely moisturizes, replenishes and comforts.
main_description: Dehydrated skin lacks moisture. It feels tight and wrinkles appear prematurely. Less protected by a thinner cutaneous barrier, it is more reactive and more likely to redden.
key_ingredients: AQUA PLUS Intensive Serum contains Hyaluronic acids of three different molecular weights: The highest molecular weight acts as a "protective coat". Its surface action is immediate and helps prevent water loss. Particles fragmented in medium and low molecular weights deeply penetrate all the epidermis layers to replenish skin with moisture.
how_to_use: Apply 1 or 2 pumps of product every morning and/or evening on clean face, before any MAVALA Swiss Skin Solution day or night care.
note: AQUA PLUS Intensive Serum may be applied on all skin types and with any cream. Suitable for the fragile eye and lip contour areas. Its 30ml bottle with pump with airless closing preserves the formula, before, during and after application. Dermatologically tested.

title: NAIL BRUSH
tagline: For neat nails and cuticles.
main_description: Compact nail brush, with flexible and resistant bristles. With folding clasps to ensure a hygienic protection of the bristles and an optimal drying.
how_to_use: To use under and on nails. Rinse well. Specially recommended with the Lightening Nail Scrub Mask. Find more tips and view our manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY.

title: NAIL BUFFER KIT
tagline: A smoothing and stimulating beauty kit for nails.
main_description: Buffing not only provides an attractive lustre but also stimulates blood circulation at the base of the nail which encourages healthy growth. The NAIL BUFFER KIT contains two pads : the grey pad has a slightly abrasive surface to even out ridges and other irregularities; the pink pad is for polishing.
how_to_use: Use on bare and dry nails. To even out irregularities, gently draw the grey buffer across the nail - in one direction only - avoiding the nail tips (once a month is sufficient), without heating the nail. Shine the nail with the pink polisher, using long, energetic, back and forth movements. Find more tips and view our manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY.

A second application may be necessary if there are several coats of polish or if your polish is a dark colour. Wash hands after use. Find more tips and view our manicure tutorial at MAVACADEMY.

title: NAIL SHIELD
tagline: Two phase system that reinforces, adds elasticity and supports soft, fragile nails
main_description: The nail plate is composed of three layers. It is naturally the visible, outer layer that is particularly sensitive to outside elements and can very easily be damaged by too much sun, cold weather, detergents,â€¦.
key_ingredients: Phase 1: Nylon fibres to form a protective network evenly on the nail surface to act as a strong Â«shieldÂ». Phase 2: Matifying pigments and ridge filler to cover the rough fibres and make the nail surface smooth, ready for nail polish application. Free from formaldehyde, sodium laureth sulfate, paraben and fragrance.
how_to_use: Phase I - Apply a coat of Nylon Fibre Base over the entire nail and allow it to dry; it forms an actual trellis. The nail will be slightly rough. Phase II - Apply a coat of Sealer and let it dry completely. If the surface remains rough, apply another coat. The nail is now smooth, you may continue your manicure.
note: This product gives only a mechanical protection to the nail.

title: NAIL WHITE CRAYON
tagline: For a classic "French Manicure".
main_description: The Nail White Crayon is the perfect tool for achieving a classic French manicure look. This easy-to-use pencil whitens the underside of your nails for a clean, polished appearance. title: PERFECTING TONING LOTION
tagline: Cleanses and purifies the skin.
main_description: External aggressions and hormonal changes can disrupt natural sebum production, causing imperfections, shine and dilated pores. The skin surface is uneven and sometimes oily, in particularly on the T-zone (forehead, nose, chin).
key_ingredients: ðŸŒ± Formulated with 92% of natural origin ingredients. Concentrated in Fleischer Willowherb, a rare persistent Alpine species rich in flavonoids (anti-inflammatory and antioxidant), the Perfecting Toning Lotion inhibits the activity of the 5-alpha-reductase, enzyme responsible for sebum production. Diminishing the activity of this enzyme in this way is the most effective method to visibly reduce sebum production, without drying out skin. It also contains Witch Hazel water, a shrub used for centuries for its disinfectant and anti-inflammatory properties. Its richness in tannins and flavonoids provides astringent, toning and purifying properties. In the PORE DETOX line, we use a distillation of freshly cut and partly dried branches to preserve all its properties for the skin. Formulated with pure Alpine water and enriched with demo-soothing Swiss Mallow flower extract. Free from mineral oil, phthalates, sodium laureth sulfate, soap and paraben.
how_to_use: Soak a cotton pad with Perfecting Toning Lotion and gently apply on face and neck, without rubbing. Apply in the morning to clean sebum produced during the night and in the evening to remove make-up and eliminate impurities from the day. Can also gently remove excess from masks.
note: Physiological pH. Dermatologically tested. Packaged in a PET transparent bottle with flow restrictor.

title: REJUVENATING MASK
tagline: Exfoliating and moisturising care.
main_description: Hands, like the face, have the right to a specific exfoliating and moisturising treatment. REJUVENATING MASK FOR HANDS provides an exfoliating action for a skin cleared from all impurities and dead skin, as well as a regenerating and moisturising action that helps delay the premature ageing of the skin. Your hands will be renewed, supple, extra soft and soothed.
key_ingredients: Contains ceramide NG and aloe vera which moisturize and soften the skin, allantoin, well-known for its soothing properties, Swiss botanical extracts (Mallow flower, cucumber, melissa) which refresh and regenerate, and an exfoliating agent which remove impurities. Free from mineral oil, phthalates and sodium laureth sulfate.
how_to_use: Apply the mask once a week with a light massaging action, by insisting on the finger joints where dead skin is more present. Then, cover hands with the plastic gloves and keep them on for 15 minutes, ideally wrapped in a warm towel. Remove the gloves delicately and rinse in lukewarm water while massaging again. Dry your hands carefully and apply the HAND CREAM or REPAIRING NIGHT CREAM.

title: REMOVER GEL
tagline: Special waterproof.

title: MAVA-MED
tagline: Solution for mycosis-infected nails
main_description: Tackle fungal nail infections effectively with MAVAMed, a powerful solution with an "Instant Killer" complex that stops fungi from spreading and aids nail healing. Enriched with lavender and eucalyptus essential oils, lactic acid and urea, it creates an environment that deters fungal growth while nourishing the nail plate.
key_ingredients: Lavender essential oil, Eucalyptus essential oil, Lactic acid, Urea, "Instant Killer" antifungal complex.
how_to_use: Apply to affected nails twice daily. Allow to dry completely before covering with socks or shoes. Continue treatment until healthy nail grows out completely.
safety_directions: For external use only. Keep away from eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Store in a cool, dry place.
